author: Rebekah Sager
title: No big shocker to learn that Herschel Walker hawked 'dry mist' spray to 'clean' you of

sentence: As the coronavirus was sweeping across the United States last summer and the country was still without a vaccine, Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker promoted a mist that he claimed would kill any covid on your body.
title: Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker promoted a mist that he claimed would kill any covid on your body

author: Scott Anderson
title: Kagro in the Morning podcast (AUDIO): Thursday, January 13, 2022

sentence: Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker claims he is sitting on a mist that could rid your body of the virus, reported the Washington Post.
author: Kalyn Womack
title: Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker Claims he Found the COVID Cure

sentence: RELATED STORY: No big shocker to learn that Herschel Walker hawked 'dry mist' spray to 'clean' you of COVID-19 AS reported by the AJC, when Aloe-Lu-Ya failed, Walker rebranded through another company with a plant extract drink called Sunutra.

title: Herschel Walker didnt just hawk
